text:
Valentin Sergeevich Shurchanov (19 April 1947 – 18 December 2020) was a Russian politician and journalist. He was born in Kanashsky District, Soviet Union. From 1999 to 2003 and again from 2007 until his death, Shurchanov was a member of the State Duma. He was a member of the Communist Party.
Shurchanov died on 18 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Moscow, aged 73.
